pages.title: Starter Templates (Display Only)
pages.body:
### Who it's for
Service businesses and local shops that want to showcase pricing and services without payment processing.

### What's included
- **Display:** Show services, pricing, hours, and contact info
- **Offline CTAs:** Call, email, visit, or link to external booking (OpenTable, Calendly, etc.)
- **Admin Panel:** Edit content, update pricing, and manage site settings
- **Mobile-First:** Responsive design that works on all devices

### What's NOT included
- âœ— No Stripe checkout or payment processing
- âœ— No shopping cart or online ordering
- âœ— No automated order confirmations

### Available templates
Starter, Restaurant, Salon, Freelancer, Consultant, Gym, Tech Repair, Cleaning, Pet Care, Product Showcase

pages.title: Checkout Templates (Payment Enabled)
pages.body:
### Who it's for
Retail shops and online sellers ready to accept payments through Stripe.

### What's included
- **Everything in Starter** (display, offline CTAs, admin panel, mobile-first)
- **Stripe Checkout:** Secure payment processing with PCI compliance
- **Order Management:** Admin dashboard to view and manage orders
- **Automated Emails:** Order confirmations sent automatically to customers
- **Webhook Support:** Real-time payment status updates

### What's NOT included
- âœ— Multi-page layouts (coming in Premium)
- âœ— Blog or CMS (coming in Premium)
- âœ— Scheduling or CRM integrations (coming in Premium)

### Available templates
Product Ordering (more checkout variants coming soon)

pages.title: Premium Suite (Coming Soon)
pages.body:
### Who it's for
Established businesses ready for a full marketing site with advanced features.

### Planned features
- **Everything in Checkout** (payment processing, order management, etc.)
- **Multi-Page Layouts:** Separate pages for blog, about, services, resources
- **Blog & CMS:** Built-in content management for SEO and storytelling
- **Scheduling:** Calendar integrations (Calendly, Cal.com, Google Calendar)
- **CRM Integration:** Automated lead capture and email marketing
- **Advanced Analytics:** Traffic tracking, conversion metrics, A/B testing
- **Custom Domains:** Bring your own domain and SSL certificates

### Timeline
Currently in development. Join the waitlist to influence the roadmap and get early access.
